definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
polysyllabic word/Chinese word made up of three or more characters

sentences.english: Retroflex suffixation in Chinese is a phenomenon of syllable merger.
sentences.chinese: 漢語兒化是一種音節融合現象。

sentences.english: Read the word clearly and don't swallow a syllable.
sentences.chinese: 把單詞讀清晰，不要吞掉音節。

sentences.english: Maine is the only state that has a one-syllable name.
sentences.chinese: 緬因州是唯一一個單音節名字的州縣。

sentences.english: And experts think he is close to his first two-syllable word.
sentences.chinese: 專家認爲，這名男孩很快就能夠說出雙音節字。

sentences.english: The stress falls on the second syllable.
Feel it in your chest, the syllables get pumpin.
If they use multi-syllable words, you should, too.
sentences.chinese: 如果他們使用多音節單詞，你也應該這麼做。
其它的音節都是非重音。

sentences.english: What word is pronounced quicker by adding a syllable to it?
sentences.chinese: 什麼單詞加一個音節反而讀得更快？

sentences.english: Monosyllabic loanwords constitute only a small proportion of the Chinese loanwords.
sentences.chinese: 漢語藉詞中，單音節外來詞只佔一小部分。

sentences.english: A single-syllable word can have several meanings depending on how it is intoned .
sentences.chinese: 一個單音節的字，依聲調的不同，可以有幾種意思。

sentences.english: To determine whether a syllable is closed or open, look at the vowel.
sentences.chinese: 首先看看英文教程中關於開音節與閉音節的描述。

sentences.english: To determine whether a syllable is closed or open, look at the vowel.
sentences.chinese: 首先看看英文教程中關於開音節與閉音節的描述。

sentences.english: The paper concluded that single-syllable adjectives may connect with object, especially in the Chinese prevailing in the early Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 筆者認爲先秦漢語單音節形容詞是可以帶賓語的。

sentences.english: Opened mouth wouldn't even monosyllabic name cleanly.
sentences.chinese: 張了張嘴連單音節也沒法利落地說出。

sentences.english: The Manchu script belongs to the table sound writing system, and its letter has two features of both syllable and phonemes.
sentences.chinese: 滿文屬於表音文字系統，其字母具有音節音位兩相性。

definition: tone/note/a tone (on a Chinese syllable)/CL:個|个[ge4]
the four tones of Middle Chinese: level tone 平聲|平声, rising tone 上聲|上声, departing tone 去聲|去声 and entering tone 入聲|入声/the four tones of Modern Standard Mandarin
the final of a Chinese syllable (the component of a syllable remaining after removal of the initial consonant, if any, and the tone, e.g. the final of "niáng" is "iang")
entering tone/checked tone/one of the four tones of Middle Chinese
rhyming word ending a line of verse/rhyme
regular verse/strict poetic form with eight lines of 5, 6 or 7 syllables and even lines rhyming
music/rhyme and rhythm/initial, 音[yin1], and final and tone, 韻|韵[yun4], of a Chinese character/phoneme
part (in multi-part instrumental or choral music), such as the soprano part or bass part
names of the tunes to which 詞|词[ci2] poems are composed
